Class tripleplay.ui.Field

Removed Methods
boolean hasFocus() Returns true if this Field is backed by a native field and that field currently has keyboard (virtual or physical) focus.
Field setTextType(TextType) Configures the keyboard type to use when text is requested via a popup.
Field setTransformer(Transformer) Set the text field transformer for use with this field.
Field setValidator(Validator) Set the text field validator for use with this field.
 

Added Methods
NativeTextField exposeNativeField() Returns this field's native text field, if it has one, otherwise null.
void focus() Attempt to focus on this field, if it is backed by a native field.
boolean hasNative() Checks if the platform has native text fields.
Binding<Validator> maxLength(int) Creates a style binding for the given maximum length.
Field setVisible(boolean)  
 

Removed Fields
Style<Integer> MAXIMUM_INPUT_LENGTH Sets the maximum number of characters that can be entered by this Field.
 

Added Fields
Style<Transformer> TRANSFORMER Sets the transformner to use when updating native text fields while being typed into.
Style<Validator> VALIDATOR Sets the validator to use when censoring keypresses into native text fields.
